metadata.description: Sample demonstrating how to use the MIDI API to receive and play MIDI messages coming from an attached input device (MIDI keyboard).
metadata.intro:
The Android MIDI API ([android.media.midi][1]) allows developers to connect a MIDI device to an Android device and process MIDI messages coming from it.
This sample demonstrates some basic features of the MIDI API, such as:
- Enumeration of currently available devices (including name, vendor, capabilities, etc) - Notification when MIDI devices are plugged in or unplugged - Receiving and processing MIDI messages
This sample contains a simple implementation of an oscillator and note playback.
[1]: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/media/midi/package-summary.html
